title: Student Resistance National Bachelor's Degree: Prerequisite degree in foreign language and computer science
content:
What else will we need to do for a diploma?



How many prerequisites will end anywhere so that we can get a high school diploma and go to university?

At the school they first form with the Bank of Themes and the EBE and now with the "National Baccalaureate", we will not all be able to get a high school diploma! Those who do not have to pay tutorials and cannot withstand pressure and stress from such an intensive program and loaded material will not only have a problem with their access to the university, but even the ability to finish high school.

What awaits us?

For those who are getting more and more difficult to reach, there is a solution to "apprenticeship"! That is, students will come out to work in miserable conditions with almost no professional rights out of 15 and this is supposed to be in vocational education.
Those of us who withstand the National Baccalaureate and all obstacles to high school, will have to deal with universities with tuition, deletions, disciplinary, university police.

They will not stop unless we stop them!

Immediately the students should rise up! To get the government back the issues bank, the minimum entry base, but not to pass the "national diploma". Let us assembly in our schools, make decisions on occupations nationwide and demonstrations.
We should not give this race on our own, but to have our parents and teachers.

  • NO IN THE "NATIONAL DIFFERENCE"!
  • NO to Pierrakaki bill!
  • NO IN THE EDUCATION OF CLASSICAL FLOORS!
author: Αντίσταση - Ηράκλειο
